es.uam.eps.bmi.social.graph

Class SocialGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.uam.eps.bmi.social.graph.SocialGraph
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BarabasiGraph, ErdosGraph

    public class SocialGraph
extends java.lang.Object
    Loads a graph and prints some output stats.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Double assortativity() 
      java.util.List<RankedDocument> clustering(int topN)
      Returns clustering coefficient for the topN nodes of the graph.
      java.lang.Double clusteringAvg()
      Returns clustering average, calculating clustering for each node if not already calculated.
      java.util.List<java.lang.Double> degreeDistribution(boolean normalize)
      returns a list of doubles where the element in position i represents the number of nodes with degree i.
      java.util.List<RankedDocument> embeddedness(int topN)
      Returns topN of edges sorted by embeddedness value.
      double friendshipParadox()
      Returns the proportion of nodes that fulfill the friendship paradox, thus meaning that the average number of his friends is greater than his own number of friends.
      java.util.List<java.lang.Double> getBetweennessList()
      Retrieves betweenness for each node in graph, the order of the nodes in list is the same order given by getInDegreesList.
      <any> getEdgeVertices(java.lang.Integer edgeID)
      Given an edge id, returns the name of the 2 vertices it is connected to.
      java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getInDegreesList()
      Retrieves a list of in Degrees for each node in the graph.
      int getLocalBridges()
      Returns the number of local bridges in graph, considering a local bridge every edge with embededdness 0.

      • SocialGraph

        protected SocialGraph()
        Empty constructor for inheritance.

      • SocialGraph

        public SocialGraph(java.lang.String filePath,
                   boolean isDirected)
            throws java.io.IOException
        Constructor, currently only supports loading graph from file.
        Parameters:
        filePath - path to csv file with edges and vertices
        isDirected - true if graph is directed.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

    • Method Detail

      • isDirected

        public boolean isDirected()
        getter for isDirected
        Returns:
        true if graph is directed, false otherwise.

      • getnEdges

        public int getnEdges()
        getter for nEdges
        Returns:
        number of edges in graph

      • getnVertex

        public int getnVertex()
        getter for nVertex
        Returns:
        number of vertices

      • getInDegreesList

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getInDegreesList()
        Retrieves a list of in Degrees for each node in the graph. The order of the nodes is the order given by Graph.getVertices
        Returns:
        A list of node input degrees.

      • pageRank

        public java.util.List<RankedDocument> pageRank(int topN,
                                               int maxIter)
        Returns topN of vertex sorted by page rank value. If topN = 0, returns all vertices, sorted by pageRank value.
        Parameters:
        topN - number of top vertices to retrieve.
        maxIter - max amount of iterations for pageRank.
        Returns:
        list of top N vertices with score

      • getPagerankList

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Double> getPagerankList()
        Retrieves pagerank score for each node in graph, the order of the nodes in list is the same order given by getInDegreesList.
        Returns:

      • clustering

        public java.util.List<RankedDocument> clustering(int topN)
        Returns clustering coefficient for the topN nodes of the graph. If topN = 0, returns all vertices, sorted by pageRank value.

      • clusteringAvg

        public java.lang.Double clusteringAvg()
        Returns clustering average, calculating clustering for each node if not already calculated. The average is just calculated as the mean of each clustering value for each node.
        Returns:
        graph clustering value.

      • embeddedness

        public java.util.List<RankedDocument> embeddedness(int topN)
        Returns topN of edges sorted by embeddedness value. If topN = 0, returns all edges, sorted by embeddedness value.
        Parameters:
        topN - number of top edges to retrieve.
        Returns:
        list of top N edges with score

      • getLocalBridges

        public int getLocalBridges()
        Returns the number of local bridges in graph, considering a local bridge every edge with embededdness 0.
        Returns:
        number of local bridges in map.

      • getEdgeVertices

        public <any> getEdgeVertices(java.lang.Integer edgeID)
        Given an edge id, returns the name of the 2 vertices it is connected to.
        Parameters:
        edgeID - number of edge
        Returns:
        pair of vertices connected to edge given

      • getBetweennessList

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Double> getBetweennessList()
        Retrieves betweenness for each node in graph, the order of the nodes in list is the same order given by getInDegreesList.
        Returns:

      • degreeDistribution

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Double> degreeDistribution(boolean normalize)
        returns a list of doubles where the element in position i represents the number of nodes with degree i. If normalize is true, each value is divided by the amount of nodes in the graph.
        Parameters:
        normalize - normalizes the distribution or returns raw values.
        Returns:
        distribution as a list.

      • friendshipParadox

        public double friendshipParadox()
        Returns the proportion of nodes that fulfill the friendship paradox, thus meaning that the average number of his friends is greater than his own number of friends.
        Returns:

      • assortativity

        public java.lang.Double assortativity()
